characterInfo.Appears in: The Way of Kings (addressed)  Words of Radiance (addressed)

characterDescription: Frost is the entity to whom Hoid addresses the letter in The Way of Kings and is also the writer of the second letter in response to that of Hoid in Words of Radiance.

characterDetails.Personality: According to Brandon, Frost is worried about a bunch of different things.
characterDetails.Characteristics:
Frost has never left Yolen and appears to lead the 17th Shard, whose nonintervention philosophy is due to his direction.
Frost is only somewhat older than Hoid. Again, according to Brandon, Frost's longevity is due to the characteristics of his race.
Because readers believe that as a dragon, Frost would have always been ageless, also according to Brandon, there is something going on with Frost that causes Hoid to say in the first letter, " ... as you are now essentially immortal, ... ".
